title: 38  El Lissitzky, Proun, 1924–25
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">38  
El Lissitzky (Russian, 1890–1941)  
Proun  
1924–25  
Collage of various cut and tipped wove papers (prepared with gouache, graphite, and varnish), and brush and pen and black ink, with red watercolor, on cream laminate cardboard; 498 × 650 mm  
Gift of Dorothy Braude Edinburg to the Harry B. and Bessie K. Braude Memorial Collection, 1998.734

</section><section id="figures">El Lissitzky, Proun, 1924–25.

</section>
